org.lemming.interfaces

Interface WorkspacePlugin

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericWorkspacePlugin, WorkspaceRandomLocalizer

    public interface WorkspacePlugin
    The WorkspacePlugin interface provides a plugin interface for modules to be used in a pipeline using a Workspace as input and output. It also contains the constants needed to specify the required fields within the standard fields of the workspace (X,Y,Z,frame,channel and ID).
    Author:
    Thomas Pengo, Joe Borbely
